overview:
Mr. Nikouyeh attributes his success to his diligence, staying on top of compliance and regulations with regard to the changes in new health care technologies.

Mr. Nikouyeh also oversees a land development company that identifies investment opportunities, develops raw land, designs and builds shopping centers.

Jason Nikouyeh is Chief Operating Officer at Duramedix Healthcare, LLC

Duramedix Healthcare has been satisfying customers since 2006 and currently provides medical equipment, supplies and healthcare products to patients nationwide. We are America’s #1 Provider of many specialty products focusing on the needs of those suffering from diabetes and arthritis. We take pride in our products, our service and most of all our patients’ positive outcomes.

milestones.description:
Many professionals in the healthcare industry use and recommend the home medical equipment and supplies from Duramedix Healthcare.  

Jason Nikouyeh is the Chief Operating Officer of Duramedix Healthcare.   For details, visit http://www.duramedix.com.
Learn how Duramedix Healthcare managed to become a trusted brand by reading this Jason Nikouyeh blog: http://bit.ly/Q4P5BE
milestones.source_description: Jason Nikouyeh: On making Duramedix Healthcare a trusted brand

milestones.description: Jason Nikouyeh’s good leadership has played a vital role in Duramedix Healthcare’s success. http://bit.ly/MXT5i3
